xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts
Class Policy

java.lang.Object
  xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts.Policy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Policy>
public final class Policy
extends Object
implements Serializable, Comparable<Policy>

An XDI policy belonging to an XDI link contract, represented as a context node.

Author:
markus

isValid

public static boolean isValid(ContextNode contextNode)
Checks if a context node is a valid XDI policy.

Parameters:
contextNode - The context node to check.
Returns:
True if the context node is a valid XDI policy.

fromLinkContractAndContextNode

public static Policy fromLinkContractAndContextNode(LinkContract linkContract,
                                                    ContextNode contextNode)
Factory method that creates an XDI policy bound to a given context node.

Parameters:
linkContract - The XDI link contract to which this XDI policy belongs.
contextNode - The context node that is an XDI policy.
Returns:
The XDI policy.

public LinkContract getLinkContract()
Returns the link contract to which this policy belongs.

Returns:
A message envelope.

getContextNode

protected ContextNode getContextNode()
Returns the underlying context node to which this policy is bound.

Returns:
A context node that represents the policy.

getAndNode

Create an AND node under $if. There can only be one AND node under $if.

Returns:
newly created context node
